short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Using this plugin, you can easily continue the video you watch on your computer from your phone.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Using this plugin, you can easily continue the video you watch on your computer from your phone. If you want to continue quickly on your phone while watching something on your computer, or if you want to quickly open a site on your phone on your computer, this extension is just for you, you can install it on your Chrome browser and enjoy surfing the internet quickly.
